Joyce Mhango-Chavula bụ onye mba Malawi na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-enye ọzụzụ nka.
Joyce Mhango-Chavula malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, site na Association for Teaching English na Malawi

O mechara sonye n'òtù ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Reformation Theayre ma soro ụlọ ihe nkiri Alabama rụọ ọrụ. N'ịbụ onye ihe nlereanya nke Gertrude Kamkwatira kpaliri, Chavula hapụrụ ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ahụ maka ahịa mgbasa ozi na ahịa n'afọ 2009, wee malite ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya, Rising Choreos Theatre Company
The Return (2011) kpọkọtara ndị Naijiria na ndị Malawi, gụnyere Patience Ozokwor, wee gaa mpaghara atọ niile nke Malawi.
Ihe nkiri Chavula mbụ, No More Tears (2013), gbara na Lilongwe na n'ụsọ osimiri nke Lake Malawi na Salima District
Ọ kọrọ akụkọ banyere nwa agbọghọ dị afọ 20 nke chọrọ ilekọta nna ya mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị n'ọrịa AIDS
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke kwuru na ọ bụ ihe onwunwe ya, na-ahapụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla.
Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2015 bụ Lilongwe meriri Best Movie si Southern Africa na  Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards nke afọ 2016.
Nyasaland (2016) nwetara nhọpụta maka 2018 Africa Movie Academy Awards maka Best Film in an African Language.  Ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara na US na 2018 Silicon Valley African Film Festival.
Chavula bụ osote onye isi oche nke Film Association of Malawi ugbu a ma bụrụkwa osote onye nduzi nke National Theatre Association of Malawi (NTAM) ruo afọ atọ, ọ bụkwa onye otu NTAM ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya maka mmemme ihe nkiri Africa (TAFF) na onye otu Oscars Malawi.
